header.activity: Friends getting ready to go out, chatting
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, anecdote telling, making arrangements

but in my head I forgot that they would tax me on that but I thought I would get paid at the end of the month because that's when invoices get paid like our back salary comes out on the eighteenth so today there was an extra hundred and fifty pounds in my bank in my salary cos I get paid today and I was like oh is that must that must be the recordings but it's two hundred quid shy
